## Call.isOnHold() method

Return an optional boolean representing whether or not the call is on hold.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isOnHold(): boolean | undefined;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

boolean \| undefined

- An optional boolean representing the hold status of the call.

## Remarks

Could possibly return `undefined` if the call state has not yet been received from the native layer.
